category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 10 (membership and withdrawal, etc.)
contents: Article 10 (Membership and withdrawal, etc.) ① In accordance with Article 5, a city/provincial sports organization that wishes to become a member of the city/provincial sports association must register as a member of the sports association member sports association and then apply for membership to the city/provincial sports association. . Revised 2021. 10. 6. ② Sports organizations that have joined the city/provincial sports association as members may withdraw from the city/provincial sports association by submitting a withdrawal form. ③ City/provincial sports councils separately establish regulations for membership and withdrawal in accordance with the sports council’s ‘Participation and Withdrawal Regulations’. ④ Deleted 2021. 10. 6. ⑤ If an event that is not registered as a member sport organization of the Sports Council wishes to become a member of the city/provincial sports association, it may join in accordance with the city/provincial sports association ‘subscription/withdrawal regulations’. Newly established 2017. 5. 15., 2021. 10. 6.
